details.title: Terahertz Pioneer: Derek Humphery Martin “The Mesh That Helped Ensnare the Cosmic Microwave Background”
details.abstract: Profiles Derek Humphery Martin, discusses his background and education, and examines his work in the field of terahertz and microwave technology and applications development.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Terahertz Science and Technology
details.sponsor: IEEE Microwave Theory and Techniques Society
